message.rftoolsbase.crafting_card.header: This item can be used for crafting. It stores ingredients and end result for a recipe
message.rftoolsbase.information_screen.h: Place this block on a powercell to display information about that cell. Right click with a wrench to change modes
message.rftoolsbase.information_screen.g: This block can also display power information about any block that supports RF/FE
message.rftoolsbase.machine_infuser.head: With this machine you can improve most other machines in RFTools in various ways. This needs dimensional shards
message.rftoolsbase.filter_module.header: This filter module is for the Modular Storage block, the Builder, the Area Scanner, or the crafter. This module can make sure the block only accepts certain types of items
message.rftoolsbase.filter_module.gold: Sneak-right click on an inventory to configure the filter based on contents or sneak-right click on a block to add that block to the filter
message.rftoolsbase.smartwrench.header: General Smart Wrench. Right-click on air to change mode
message.rftoolsbase.smartwrench.gold: Use as a normal wrench: sneak-right-click to pick up and right-click to rotate
message.rftoolsbase.smartwrench_select.h: General Smart Wrench. Right-click on air to change mode
message.rftoolsbase.smartwrench_select.g: Use as a block selector: sneak-right-click to select master block and right-click to associate blocks with master
message.rftoolsbase.security_manager:
@aContents: %s stacks
@fThis block manages your security cards
